column1: Pennadam (Pen Aavu Kadam) is a panchayat town in Cuddalore district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu.

Pennadam has an average elevation of 54 metres (177 feet). Sudarkozhundeeswarar Temple was built in the early Chola period. Pennadam is also the birthplace of one of the Nayan Margal namely Maigandanathar. A temple was also built for Maigandanathar in this town in 20th Century.
